article.author: Doug Giles
article.mainText: Please disable your Ad Blocker in order to interact with the site. Lets’ go blow up some infidels! But FIRST… Lemme take a selfie! OOPS! Maybe not the sharpest tool in the shed. You’ve heard of blowing yourself to Hell. Watch someone LITERALLY do it… and bring his murderous buddies with him! Watch: Something this stupid is best celebrated with mockery. There is ONE song that does so perfectly: (apologies in advance) This is GREAT news — just ask their intended victims! — And everybody loves to hear good news, so SHARE it!
article.title: PHOTO BOMB: Watch Radical BLOW UP Friends Taking Selfie With Phone DETONATOR
